directions.step:
Freeze Margarita mix. Place frozen mix in blender, top with wine & lime juice; blend until frothy. Moisten rim of glass; dip in salt & pour in Margarita wine mixture. Serve immediately.
GRIGG'S RESTAURANT, EL PASO, TX
From the <The Bliss of Cooking Returns>, Fort Bliss Officers Wives Club, Ft. Bliss, TX. Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
